text.__SUMMARY__:
Albizia vaughanii is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Mauritius.
Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical dry forests.
text.Sources: Allet, M. (TPTNC) & Strahm, W. (2000). "Albizia vaughanii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2000: e.T33503A9787452. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2000.RLTS.T33503A9787452.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
